ygData.subject: Re: Looking for a few good men (and women)
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to be a LOT less specific on the type of people you group with, and where you go! Try this:  I am a level 15 warrior on Fennin Ro based in Freeport
ygData.messageBody:
You need to be a LOT less specific on the type of people you group with,
and where you go!

Try this: I am a level 15 warrior on Fennin Ro based in Freeport seeking
3-5 others around my level that would like to group, hopefully to
get some decent cash.

You'll never get the group you specify.


> From: MikeDiClem@...
>
> i know this is a bit off the subject, but it indirectly effects smithing. I'm
> looking for two level 16 wizards, one level 14-16 monk, one level 14-16
> cleric and a level 14-16 magician or enchanter to go on a journey to upper
> guk. the point of this journey is to accumulate lots of money and magical
> items so we can make money to use to further our smithing skill. i am
> currently broke. this is on the fennin ro server, i am a level 15 warrior
> named Coil. I would prefer that you are a small to medium character because
> trolls barbarians and ogres can block passage ways. Also if anyone wants to
> give me money if they are high level and have too much i'd accept it =) Email
> me if you are interested please, thanks.
>
